description: Love at first sight doesn't exist, but lust and infatuation at first sight certainly do. And Dallas Steele spotted Mike Maverick on the way to a business lunch. He invites Mike over to his apartment for some wine, and Dallas showers Mike with attention. Though Mike is a successful young business guy, he's always had daddy issues, and it doesn't take much for him to service Dallas' bareback cock with his mouth and ass!
title: Mike Maverick Rides Dallas Steele's Bare Boss Cock
